game.name: Scrap Story
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Scrap your way through this crafty paper RPG in search of your lost brother. Explore the wilds, meet quirky characters, and customize your party to take on kooky critters in turn based combat with an engaging twist.
